LanguageData.WakeUp.label: Amphetamines
LanguageData.WakeUp.description: A synthetic stimulant. Amphetamines fill the user's need for rest, and allows users to work for extended periods without getting tired. However, repeated use will produce an addiction which reduces mental performance and can even generate psychotic breaks.\n\nIn the most competitive universities and companies of many worlds, high-flying achievers are known for occasionally breaking down into psychosis due to amphetamine addiction.
